name: Hungry Wolf
description:
This is cool horror game Hungry Wolf. In which you have to defend against the wolf with a slingshot. A shot from it can turn on the lamps in the room. The bright light of the lamps scares off the wolf. Because only bright light can scare a hungry wolf. You only need to hold out for 3 minutes for winning. Good luck player.

* Cool graphic

* Good music

* Interesting gameplay

* Excellent management
